short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A site blocker that allows you to create a list of sites to block.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus Site Blocker streamlines the process of blocking websites to boost productivity. A user can create a list of websites to block directly from the popup window. Blocked sites are redirected to a customizable page.
